title: Engine Overheating
details: The engine temperature rises quickly and the warning light comes on after 10 minutes of driving.

title: Brake Noise
details: Squealing noise is heard when applying the brakes at LOW speeds.

title: Transmission Slipping
details: Transmission slips when shifting from second to third gear.

title: AC Not Cooling
details: Air conditioning blows warm air even after 15 minutes of operation.

title: Battery Drains Fast
details: Car battery loses charge overnight even when all devices are turned off.

title: Suspension Noise
details: Rattling noise from the suspension when driving over bumps.

title: Power Steering Failure
details: Steering becomes very hard to turn, especially at LOW speeds.

title: Headlight Flicker
details: Headlights occasionally flicker while driving at night.

title: Fuel Smell Inside Car
details: Noticeable fuel smell inside the car after refueling.

title: Door Lock Malfunction
details: Driver's side door lock does not respond to key fob commands.
